programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Zanghat Arreeh
programme.desc: A historical drama set in Libya during the period of the British colonization. It discusses the relations between Muslims and Jews, and the preferential treatment the British gave to the Italian and western communities.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe

programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. Anna Edwards, Tom Mackenzie and Mark Cudmore break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests who have skin in the game. Ep1

programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer
programme.desc: As Ghazal's father forces her to marry a wealthy businessman despite the big age difference between them, the circumstances force her to toughen up in order to deal with those around her, as she gets to know the young man Seif El Khedewy and falls for him.

programme.title: Progeny Of Al Aghrab (Ep12)
programme.desc: Thriller, People, Drama 2021 Presenting the story of a man from upper Egypt who is accused of murder; after spending jail time, he returns to revenge from his worst enemies. Amir Karara, Ahmed El Sakka, Mai Omar, Ahmed Malek, Ahmad Dash, Mohamed Samy, Mohamed Samy

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: A British woman marries a Khaleeji and lives in Arab society. After her husband's death, she becomes responsible for her family, as her life intertwines with the lives of those around her, and many clashes occur due to her unfamiliarity with some Arab traditions.

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep66)
programme.desc: Comedy, Romance 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. programme.title: Beirut's Bride (Ep53)

programme.title: Nasl El Aghrab
programme.desc: In the wake of a fight that left half the members of Ghefran and Assaf's families dead, the latter is released from prison to try and restore the balance of power between him and his archenemy Gherfan, especially as the latter had married Assaf's beloved ex-wife and raised his son.

programme.title: Without Restraint (Ep12)

programme.title: 30 Youm
programme.desc: Tarek Helmy is a young married psychiatrist who has a daughter named Farida. On her first birthday, a patient called Tawfiq Al-Masry comes to Tarek, explaining to him an experiment he wants to carry out: he will pick someone, "The Chosen", and put him through a cycle of self-destructive crises over thirty days.

programme.title: Al-Heiba
programme.desc: Alia lives with her husband and their son in a European country. When the husband dies, she returns to Lebanon to bury him, only to discover that his family wants to take her son away, unless she marries his brother Jabal. She also discovers that her husband's family are arms smugglers.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod glawog, diflas yn y nen heddiw ond yn gyfle da i'r Cymylaubychain hel atgofion am ddiwrnodiau brafiach. It's a wet, miserable day today but remember the happy, better days!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn deall pam fod dwylo Magi mor ddiddorol. Mae o wir eisiau cyffwrdd croen yr hen wraig ond nid yw'n siwr os y dylai! Today Pablo really wants to feel Magi's wrinkled hands!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Guto eisiau gwybod o ble ddaw lafant, felly mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd ag ef i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio go iawn. Guto wants to know where lavender comes from.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Tro ma: Cymru! Dyma wlad gyda heniaith, sef y Gymraeg, cestyll, bwyd enwog fel bara lawr a phrifddinas o'r enw Caerdydd. This time we visit Wales to learn about the language, castles & more.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: New: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Mai-Mai yn darganfod perl drudfawr! When a pearl is taken underwater, Mai-Mai and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to get it back.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd y criw o forladron bach o Ysgol Pwll Coch yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys yn ôl? Can the Ysgol Pwll Coch pirates help Ben Dant and Cadi?

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Meri Mew yn trio rhyddhau pêl Sali Mali wedi iddi fynd yn sownd mewn coeden. Meri Mew the cat tries to dislodge Sali Mali's ball which is stuck in a tree and has to be rescued herself!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae hwyaden Hari, Cwac, ar goll ac mae Ela'n benderfynol o'i ddarganfod. Mae Ben yn ei hanfon i edrych am "ddrôr". Ben sends Ela to find a word that could prove very useful, 'drawer'.

programme.title: Yr Ysgol
programme.desc: Bydd criw Ysgol Sant Curig yn mynd i lan y môr a bydd Rhydian yn cael hwyl ar ei wyliau yn Nhyddewi. The Sant Curig crew are at the seaside and Rhydian has fun on his holiday in St David's

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wrth blymio i'r dyfnfor du, mae criw o Fwydod Tanio yn ymosod ar yr Octonots. While diving down to the Midnight Zone, the Octonauts are attacked by bomber worms.

programme.title: Llan-ar-goll-en
programme.desc: Mae Radli Migins yn clywed si bod yna syrcas yn Llan-ar-goll-en, ond pan mae'n mynd i chwilio amdani, does dim golwg ohoni. Radli Migins hears there's a circus in Llan-ar-goll-en, but where?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae Odo isie creu arfgraff ar Pen Bandit a Prif Swyddog Plu, ond dyw e ddim cweit yn llwyddo. Odo wants to impress Camp Leader and Inspector Feathers but things don't turn out as he wants.

programme.title: Halibalw
programme.desc: Ymunwch â chriw Halibalw am raglen llawn hwyl, chwerthin, canu a dawnsio. Join the Halibalw crew for lots of fun, laughter, singing and dancing.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Cyfres am anifeiliaid y byd - y tro hwn: y rhai talaf ac un o'r byraf! Series about animals around the world - this time, some of the tallest and one of the shortest!

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Fflamia yn penderfynu gadael y Pawenlu am gyfnod, mae'r cwn yn gweithio'n galed i'w gael yn ôl. When Fflamia decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups want him back!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion

programme.desc: Mae gan Po freuddwyd i agor Siop, ond mae hi wedi dewis y safle anghywir ar lwybr poblogaidd. A Po has a dream to open a shop, but her spot on a popular walking trail is all wrong.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc, a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jamborî!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae gwylan arall yn glanio yn yr harbwr ac mae'n edrych yn debyg iawn i Gwil! Mae'r wylan yn drysu Gwil a Celfin yn lân. Another seagull lands in the harbour and it looks a lot like Gwil!

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: New: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du yn ymuno â'r Criw Printio.Dysga sut mae melyn, Gwyrddlas, Majenta a Du yn gweithio hefo'i gilydd wrth brintio. Learn how yellow, cyan, magenta, and black work together in printing.

programme.title: New: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Pigog, Gwich, Dan a Crawc yn mynd lan yr afon i chwilio am y Graig Canu ddirgel. Pigog, Gwich, Dan and Crawc go on a boat journey upriver to find the mysterious Song Stone.

programme.title: New: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Y Traeth to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n mynd i wersylla i Goedwig Ocido gyda Brethwen ac yn cyfarfod â mwy o anifeiliaid y nos na'r disgwyl. Blero and his friends go on a camping trip in Ocido Forest.

programme.title: New: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno â chriw o ffrindiau i badlfyrddio, ac awn am dro i Blas Newydd, Ynys Mon gyda Elain, Beca a Nel. Today, Huw paddleboards, and Meleri plays tennis with Jack.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Cawn drip i ganolfan pili-palod sy'n gyfle gwych i weld pili pala go iawn - ac yn help i'r Cywion ddysgu mwy am y gair 'pili-pala'. A trip to the Butterfly Centre and the word 'pili-pala'.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan Seren fag yn llawn losin, mae Fflwff yn darganfod berfa yn llawn o ddail tra mae'r Capten yn gwagio bwced sydd yn llawn o ddwr. Come to Shwshaswyn for some calm and focus.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Jac yn cael parti 'pobl sy'n helpu' gyda Cwnstabl Jêms o Cacamwnci. Jac will be having a 'people who help' party with Cwnstabl Jêms from Cacamwnci.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae prinder dwr ym Mhen Cyll. Mae Digbi a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio dysgu pam. There's a water-shortage in Pen Cyll. Digbi and his friends go in search of the reason.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Dim ond un darn o arian sydd gan Panda - mae'n rhaid ei fod wedi colli'r gweddill. Tybed all ei ffrindiau ei helpu i ddod o hyd iddo? Panda has lost some money -can his friends find it?

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Mae'r ddau ddireidus yn mynd i'r siop ddodrefn, gan lwyddo i golli'r lythyren 'n' oddi ar un o arwyddion y ffenest! The monsters visit a furniture shop and manage to lose the letter 'n'!

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u byd bach o hud
programme.desc: Mae'r plant yn awyddus i wybod beth sy'n digwydd i'r sêr yn ystod y dydd felly maen nhw'n ymweld â'r Coblyn Doeth yn y llyfrgell. The children visit the Wise Old Elf in the Elf Library.

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u Byd Bach Hud
Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Corn Hir, Llangefni yn ymweld ag ASRA yr wythnos yma. Children from Ysgol Corn Hir, Llangefni visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Heledd yn darganfod fod mêl yn foddion da tra bod Penny'n helpu Izzy i beidio bod ofn gwenyn. Heledd discovers honey is the best medicine as Penny helps Izzy overcome her fear of bees.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches to make you laugh!

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Timpo heddiw? What's happening in the Timpo world today?

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd! Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. A new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Twt ar ras unwaith eto. Cyn hir, mae'r holl frysio yn arwain at drafferthion ar y dwr. Twt is racing about at full speed once again. Before long, his racing about creates havoc!

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd â'r criw printio - Melyn, Gwyrddlas a Majenta! Meet the Printing Crew - Yellow, Cyan and Magenta!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc, Dan, Gwich a Pigog yn helpu Pwti i ddod o hyd i wenyn i'w darlunio. Crawc's hiccups ensure that any bees can't get close enough for the crew to either draw them or get honey.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, efo disgyblion Ysgol Gymraeg Bro Teyr. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish into something special.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Gwynfryn wedi colli ei glustiau moch coed. Fydd Blero a'i ffrindiau'n gallu dod o hyd iddyn nhw mewn pryd ar gyfer Jamborî ar Rew Ocido? Snowden has lost his pine cone ears, oh no...

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri yn ymweld á gardd Ysgol Pendalar, bydd Evan ac Idris yn mynd ar daith ystlumod yn y nos, a bydd Huw yn nofio yn y mor gyda Jac. More adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Trefi Gwyllt Iolo
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo yn darganfod ystlumod yn cysgu mewn ty hanesyddol yn Rhuthun a robin goch yn canu drwy'r nos ym Mangor. Iolo comes across bats, a noisy robin and alien toads in Welsh towns. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Cymru, Dad a Fi
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: dal cimwch ger Ynysoedd Tudwal; rhwyfo ar Lyn y Dywarchen; a nofio efo morloi Ynys Enlli. This time: lobster fishing; boat rowing; and a swim with some Bardsey Island seals!

programme.title: Cymru, Dad a Fi - Season 1, Episode 4
Adre
programme.desc: Yr wythnos hon byddwn yn ymweld â chartref yr awdur a'r actor - Geraint Lewis, yn Aberaeron. This week we'll be visiting the home of actor and writer - Geraint Lewis, in Aberaeron.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: New: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Agor y Clo
programme.desc: Ymhlith y creiriau y tro hwn fydd casgliad o Sgrimsho hen a newydd, llestri tra gwahanol a hen leisiau o'r gorffennol! Manon Elis meets a local historian who collects voices from the past.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Brown, y chwilotwr lliw, yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Colour explorer Brown arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae hi mor niwlog, mae Crëyr yn cael trafferth cludo pecyn o gacennau i Llwyd ac mae pethau'n mynd o ddrwg i waeth. Crëyr struggles to deliver her cake package to Llwyd in deep fog.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd goleudy Ocido'n torri, mae Blero, Dylan, Sïan a Swn yn mynd ar daith beryglus i Fynydd Dirgel i chwilio am y golau nad yw byth yn diffodd. The Ocido lighthouse breaks down, oh no!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn cwrdd a theulu sy'n mwynhau dringo, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Bro Teyrnon yn gwneud ioga. Today: Meleri will be cycling with Elis on the pump track, plus more.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: New: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae PB wedi clywed bod 'na fenyn cnau daear ar gownter y gegin ond mae Lloyd i fod yn gwarchod... Faced with the prospect of missing out on peanut butter Lloyd concocts a plan to get some.

programme.title: MabinOgi-Ogi a Mwy!
programme.desc: Fersiwn bywiog criw Stwnsh o stori Clustiau March. Digon o hwyl, chwerthin a chanu! Join the Stwnsh team for their lively version of the Clustiau March legend. Plenty of fun and singing!

programme.title: New: Boom!
programme.desc: Tro hwn bydd y brodyr Bidder yn cystadlu mewn her catapult a bydd Rhys yn gorwedd ar wely o hoelion. The Bidder brothers compete in a catapult challenge and Rhys lies on a bed of nails.

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Mae Emrys a Sue yn teithio i Scottsdale, Arizona ar antur i brynu ceffylau i rai o'u cleientiaid cyfoethog. The pair travel to Scottsdale, Arizona for the world's largest Arabian horse show.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Highlights of the Nathaniel MG Cup final, and Cardiff City v Wrexham takes centre stage in the Genero Adran Premier.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Daw syndod i Colin, Kylie a Britt pan ddaw'r heddlu at y drws, a hebrwng Colin i'r orsaf... DJ can't hide his anger towards Eileen when he finds that a fox has been killed due to the hunt.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Gyda chywilydd mawr, mae Trystan yn gorfod gofyn am help - ond yn anffodus mae'n gweithedu fymryn yn rhy hwyr. Lowri's absence for the night leads to serious consequences.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C

programme.desc: Jess Davies sy'n siarad ag amryw ferched i ddarganfod a oes digon yn cael ei wneud i gadw merched yn ddiogel o aflonyddu rhywiol. Jess Davies explores the issue of sexual harrassment.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, Jason Mohammad sy'n ymuno efo Owain ar daith emosiynol i gyfarfod y bobl sydd wedi chwarae rhan allweddol yn ei fywyd. Today, Jason Mohammad joins Owain on a journey of his life.
